resources.string: Click on the following buttons to know more about the UV Index and its risks.

string-array.name: lowRiskMsgs
string-array.item: Cover up and use sunscreen if you burn easily

string-array.name: moderateRiskMsgs
string-array.item: Cover up and use sunscreen if you go outside
Stay in shade when the sun is strong

string-array.name: highRiskMsgs
string-array.item: Cover up, wear a hat an sunglasses, and use sunscreen

string-array.name: veryHighRiskMsgs
string-array.item: Take extra precautions. Avoid the sun
Seek shade, cover up, wear a hat an sunglasses, and use sunscreen

string-array.name: extremeRiskMsgs
string-array.item: Avoid sun exposure as most as you can
You must seek shade, cover up, wear a hat an sunglasses, and use sunscreen
